channel.title: Help how do i make npcs not talk
channel.description: ok i need some help as you can see how do i make every npc not attack cuse i got a big problem you attack em the hit 40's how can i make em not attack thanks

Meh, if you dont want them to talk, delete NPCHandler.java

item.title: Help how do i make npcs not talk
item.dc:creator: @hey_w8_u_nub hey w8 u nub
item.description:
@hey_w8_u_nub wrote:

Go to NPCHandler.java and type in some npc talks. it should look like:
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to Easter-Scape!”;
}

The number in there is npc id like this: if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { tjust copy those things, switch the npctype and text for anything you want.

Read full topic
